result.purpose: Defines data models related to web3 transactions, signatures, and decoding parameters.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating related data models for web3 functionalities.

internal/domains/web3/models/decode.go.purpose: Defines data models for decoding transaction parameters in a web3 context.

internal/domains/web3/models/signature.g.purpose: Defines data models for handling signatures in a web3 context.

internal/domains/web3/models/transaction.purpose: Defines data models for transactions, transfers, and approvals in a web3 context.
